desc: Quality body care products made by hand with time-honored recipes using unrefined, raw, natural ingredients and pure essential oils. No formulations, preservatives or dyes ever! Trust in our Bar and Liquid Soap, Whipped Shea Butters, Balms, Bath Soaks, Scrubs and Mists! Owned and operated by two sisters since 2003.

layout.text: Fresh bar soap recipes previously available only in select bulk displays. For a limited time, get all
